import axios from 'axios' import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Update() { const redirect = useNavigate() const navigateHome = ()=>{ redirect('/') } const [title, setTitle]=useState() const [author, setAuthor]=useState() const [cover, setCover]=useState() //geting the details to be edited const getBookById= async(book)=>{ await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:2014/books/${id}').then(res=>{ setAuthor(res.data.author) setTitle(res.data.title) setCover(res.data.cover) }) } function saveChanges(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(title) console.log(author) console.log(cover) navigateHome() } return (
Update Book Details
setTitle(e.target.value)} required />
setAuthor(e.target.value)} required={true} />
setCover(e.target.value)} required />
) }
